subject: Success! Your files have been uploaded to Arius

body.content:
Dear Reserving actuary,

Your files have been successfully uploaded to Arius File server and are now ready to be uploaded.

Upload details:

  • Status - {status}
  • Files uploaded - {filesUploaded}
  • Uploaded time - {uploadedTime}

If you have any questions or require assistance, please contact our support team at DnAClaims@guardinsurancegroup.onmicrosoft.com.

Thank you!
